text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Stars above in endless night
Dancing under neon beams
Chasing all our starlit dreams

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the midnight glow
Feel the pulse and let it flow
Hands are reaching heartbeats rise
Magic in your lovers eyes

[Chorus]
Feel the rhythm in your feet
Every moment is a treat
Underneath the starlit skies
Love and dreams will never die

[Verse 3]
Laughter echoes through the streets
In the night where love repeats
Footsteps twirling hearts collide
Journey on this endless ride

[Chorus]
Feel the rhythm in your feet
Every moment is a treat
Underneath the starlit skies
Love and dreams will never die

[Bridge]
Wish upon that shining star
Here together near or far
Twilight holding onto dreams
Life is more than what it seems
title: Starlit Dreams
